title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this year's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, chances at redemption and general silliness, college football bowl season always delivers.

title: Sources: Hoosiers DC Haines gets lucrative deal
content: Indiana has reached an agreement with defensive coordinator Bryant Haines that will make him one of the nation's highest-paid assistants, sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: Mendoza adds to honors, scores Maxwell, O'Brien
content: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza captured the Maxwell Award as the nation's player of the year and the Davey O'Brien Award as top quarterback Friday night.

title: Bedard hurt on last-second faceoff, out for Sat.
content: Blackhawks star Connor Bedard grasped his right shoulder as he left the ice after Friday night's 3-2 loss to the Blues, and the team has ruled him out for Saturday's game against Detroit.

title: Messi statue event in India marred by fan unrest
content: Lionel Messi's "GOAT Tour" of India was marred by chaotic scenes on Saturday after fans threw ripped up seats and invaded the pitch.

title: SGA: Thunder 'absolutely' want NBA wins record
content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander says the Thunder are after every trophy or record they can obtain, including the NBA's record of 73 wins.

title: Moore facing charges of stalking, home invasion
content: Sherrone Moore, abruptly fired this week as Michigan football coach, was charged Friday with three crimes including home invasion and stalking a person he had dated, prosecutors said.

title: Curry wows with 39 in return, but Dubs stumble
content: Despite a brilliant 39-point performance from Stephen Curry, who returned from a quad injury, the Warriors lost 127-120 to the Wolves after allowing 39 fourth-quarter points.

title: Canucks trade Hughes to Wild for 3 players, pick
content: Canucks captain Quinn Hughes was traded to the Wild for defenseman Zeev Buium, center Marco Rossi, winger Liam Ohgren and a first-round pick on Friday.

title: üçº Josh Allen, Hailee Steinfeld expecting first child
content: The Buffalo Bills quarterback and the "Sinners" star got married in May and are expecting their first baby together.

title: Last-minute prep on NFL Week 15: We have sleepers, QB questions, trends to watch and more
content: Big day for Ladd McConkey? Fantasy upside for Isaiah Likely? An advantage for Drake Maye? Lofty stat predictions for Christian Watson? Let's look at Week 15.

title: Untold stories of Detroit Lions QB Jared Goff
content: Goff has a toughness that belies his California cool demeanor. Four stories that explain the Lions QB, from those who know him best.

title: What is dry needling and what happened to T.J. Watt? Answering key questions
content: Is dry needling common for NFL players? How long will the Steelers star be sidelined? Here's what we know.

title: Army-Navy: Inside the many traditions of America's Game
content: From the "prisoner exchange" to a Presidential visit, there's plenty of spectacle beyond the game itself.

title: The hope and heroism of Army safety Larry Pickett Jr.
content: In August, Pickett Jr. came upon a terrifying scene: power lines down, a car on fire and a man close to death.

title: Expert picks, best bets: Royval's path to victory at UFC Fight Night
content: Where's the value on the final UFC fight card of the year? MMA insiders and a betting expert make their picks for Brandon Royval vs. Manel Kape.

title: The many shirts of John Cena's WWE career
content: Before John Cena's final match, take a look back at his legendary career through the lens of his iconic shirts.

title: NBA 25 under 25: The best young stars, ranked by future potential
content: Which youngsters are among the next class of superstars? Which are already there? Our NBA experts rank their top 25 under 25.

title: NBA Cup preview: Everything to know about each semifinal in Las Vegas
content: The Emirates NBA Cup semifinals are officially set. Here is everything to know ahead of Saturday's games.

title: Big East Bracketology preview: NCAA tournament predictions for every team
content: UConn has separated itself from St. John's. Three more teams look bubble bound. And one potential sleeper.

title: Who is willing to spend to keep up with the Dodgers and Blue Jays this winter?
content: Baseball insiders were abuzz over L.A. and Toronto at this week's winter meetings, as both have the money -- and pull -- to dominate the winter.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Brock Purdy, Chase Brown are league winners down the stretch
content: With the upcoming schedule, don't be surprised if Brock Purdy and Chase Brown are difference-makers down the stretch.

title: Top 50 USMNT players, ranked by club form: A new No. 1 leads the American pool
content: Who are the 50 best USMNT players as 2025 comes to a close? We have a first-time No. 1 in our ranking as the USMNT Player Performance Index returns.

title: Laurens' weekend preview: Liverpool's Salah drama, Tyne-Wear derby returns, more
content: What is Julien Laurens watching this weekend? In addition to big derby games in France, the Netherlands and England, we're all wondering if Mo Salah will feature for Liverpool.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea lead Man United, Newcastle in Smit race
content: Chelsea are the front-runners in the race to sign AZ Alkmaar wunderkind Kees Smit. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Amaravati farmers‚Äô issues will be addressed on priority, says Union Minister Pemmasani Chandra Sekhar
content: Most of the 47 land acquisition cases under review have reached resolution stage and the remaining will be settled in one week, he asserts

title: Family trio holds the key as voters deliver hung verdict in Pala municipality
content: Binu Pulikkakkandam, a CPI(M) renegade, his daughter Diya Binu, and his brother Biju Pulikkakkandam. While Mr. Pulikkakkandam, a businessman-turned-politician, emerged victorious from Ward 14, Ms. Binu, an economics graduate from Madras Christian College who is preparing to pursue an MBA degree, has won from Ward 15.

title: UDF sweeps four Corporations, LDF reduced to one, BJP opens score
content: The UDF secures 46 out of 76 seats in Kochi and gains ground in Thrissur and Kollam, highlighting a changing political landscape. The LDF retains Kozhikode Corporation, while the NDA celebrates its first municipal victory in Thiruvananthapuram.

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF bucks the trend in¬†Pathanamthitta, wins majority
content: UDF wins a clear majority in district panchayat, besides securing  34 grama panchayats and seven block panchayats. It also wins in three municipalities

title: Andhra Pradesh stands first in energy conservation at the national level
content: The State bags first prize in Group-II of the National Energy Conservation Awards for the fourth consecutive year, says Chief Secretary Vijayanand; APSPDCL CMD Sivasankar to receive the award on behalf of the AP State Energy Conservation Mission from President Droupadi Murmu on December 14

title: Students should focus on problem-driven learning: experts
content: They say while upscaling through pedagogy is important, rote learning is passe, and practical and real world learning outside the classroom shapes the MBA journey better and impacts students‚Äô career prospects

title: Making brain death determination a standard of care in ICUs
content: This will make brain death certification a normal, non-negotiable definition of death, just as cardiac death, thereby opening up the possibility that brain death declaration and possible organ donation becomes a standard hospital procedure, not a transplant-driven activity.

title: TDP leader denies ‚Äòcoercion‚Äô of YSRCP corporators ahead of Nellore Mayor election
content: Party believes in action rather than rhetoric and will not indulge in claims on who will become the Mayor, says Giridhar Reddy

title: ‚ÄòClarity of purpose transforms dreams into reality‚Äô
content: Chief Executive Officer of Magna International, Seetarama (Swamy) Kotagiri has called on the students keep asking themselves ‚Äòwhat‚Äôs next?‚Äô because it was the clarity of purpose that transformed dreams into reality.

title: LDF‚Äôs uninterrupted 25-year reign ends in Kollam Corporation
content: UDF wins 27 divisions in the 56-member council, LDF plummets from 39 seats in 2020 to just 16 seats, NDA wins 12 seats

title: Book exploring the inner workings of tax administration in India released
content: The book has been authored in the memoir style by Director-General of Income Tax (Investigation) Pratap Singh

title: ‚Çπ479-crore project to develop ‚Äòpriority road corridors' in Vizag and Vijayawada
content: A total of 110-km of roads will be developed under the first phase of the City Roads Improvement Program, says Municipal Administration and Urban Development Principal Secretary Suresh Kumar

title: KSRTC launches ‚ÄòAccident Emergency Response Vehicles‚Äô to improve bus accident and breakdown management
content: In the event of an accident, teams can help drivers and conductors, provide immediate support, and shift injured passengers to nearby hospitals when required.

title: 'Shame on you Mamata!' BJP tears into CM over Messi event mess; makes 3 demands
content: Chaos erupted at Salt Lake stadium during Lionel Messi's visit, sparking a sharp BJP attack on West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee. Opposition leader Suvendu Adhikari accused the state government of gross mismanagement and demanded Banerjee's resignation, citing fan disappointment and alleged exploitation. Banerjee has ordered a high-level inquiry into the incident.

title: Messi's Kolkata tour chaos: Bengal cops detain organiser; tickets to be refunded
content: Chaos erupted at Kolkata's Salt Lake stadium as thousands of fans protested after a brief, tightly controlled appearance by Lionel Messi. The West Bengal Police detained the main event organizer, with authorities promising ticket refunds and strict action against those responsible for the mismanagement.

title: How Kolkata‚Äôs wait for Messi slipped into disorder - timeline of events
content: The city‚Äôs long wait to see the Argentine star did not last long. Messi was forced to end his lap of honour at the Vivekananda Yuba Bharati Krirangan after the crowd surged towards the field. Bottles were thrown from the stands, and security staff escorted him off the ground within minutes.

title: 2001 Parliament attack: When terror from 'sarhad' struck Sansad
content: Terrorists attacked India's Parliament on December 13, 2001. This event brought the threat of terrorism to the nation's core. Security forces bravely fought back, preventing a greater crisis. The attack reshaped India's security architecture, leading to enhanced surveillance and intelligence sharing. It remains a critical moment in India's fight against terrorism.

title: Future of work: Microsoft India head predicts end of long careers; 'refusal to learn‚Äô is the risk
content: Microsoft India President Puneet Chandok predicts the current generation will be the last to experience stable, long-term careers due to AI. He emphasized that continuous learning, not automation, is key to avoiding job displacement, as AI will dissect and unbundle roles.  Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella highlighted data's strategic value in the AI era, citing successful AI implementations in India.

title: 'Dhurandar in rebranding': Cong on renaming of MGNREGA; accuses BJP of hating Gandhi
content: The Congress criticized the Modi government for approving a bill to rename the Mahatma Gandhi national rural employment guarantee act (MGNREGA) to 'Poojya Bapu Grameen Rozgar Yojna'. The party accused the Centre of rebranding rather than reforming the scheme and attempting to erase Mahatma Gandhi's legacy from villages.

title: Drama in Australia! England security's confrontation with media - Watch
content: England's Ashes tour faces another setback as security staff clashed with a Channel Seven cameraman at Brisbane airport. The incident occurred during the team's check-in for their flight to Adelaide, adding to the team's already challenging series. This confrontation highlights ongoing scrutiny of England's tour preparations as they trail 0-2 in the series.

title: 'Dhurandhar' box office day 9: Crosses Rs 255 crore mark
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' is a box office hit, crossing ‚Çπ255 crore by its ninth day. Director Rohit Shetty lauded the film as 'naya Hindi cinema.' The movie boasts a strong ensemble cast and has garnered significant audience appreciation, particularly for Ranveer's intense portrayal and Akshaye Khanna's memorable introduction.

title: Oracle-OpenAI deal: Report says data centres delayed; tech giant responds
content: Oracle's quarterly results missed revenue targets, sparking concerns after a report claimed delays in its massive data center projects for OpenAI.  However, Oracle insists contractual commitments are on track, with the first Texas facility progressing.  Despite the clarification, Oracle shares saw a dip, highlighting investor sensitivity to the AI infrastructure build-out.

title: Sidhu Moosewala‚Äôs mother sends legal notice to Christian organisation for defamation
content: Sidhu Moosewala's mother, Charan Kaur, has issued a legal notice for defamation against the Global Christian Action Committee. The notice demands a public apology and Rs 10 lakh compensation for the alleged malicious use of her picture during a protest. The committee claims the usage was unintentional.

title: Retail inflation may reduce by 35 basis pts in FY25-26; driven by GST 2.0: Report
content: GST reforms are projected to reduce retail inflation by up to 35 basis points in 2025-26, with an estimated 25 basis points decline already observed between September and November 2025 due to rate adjustments. While Kerala faces higher inflation driven by specific commodity prices, national CPI is expected to average 1.8% in 2025-26.

title: 'Private PR event' - AIFF distances itself from Messi's India tour
content: The All India Football Federation expressed concern over crowd control issues and security lapses at a Lionel Messi event in Kolkata. Thousands of fans were left unable to see the footballer due to VVIPs and security personnel surrounding him, leading to disruptions including thrown bottles and damaged stadium property.

title: Climate migration begins: Tuvaluans relocate to Australia; special visas take effect
content: Australia has welcomed the first climate migrants from Tuvalu, a Pacific nation facing inundation due to rising sea levels. A groundbreaking bilateral treaty allows Tuvaluans to live, study, and work in Australia, offering "mobility with dignity" as climate impacts worsen. This initiative marks a significant step in addressing climate-induced displacement.

title: Dwyane Wade Says ‚ÄúI‚Äôll Miss Him‚Äù in Emotional Tribute to LeBron James
content: Dwyane Wade, reflecting on LeBron James' 23rd NBA season, expresses admiration and a fan's perspective on an impending era's end.  He acknowledges James' elite performance, even as fans call for retirement, and cherishes their shared championship history. Wade also humorously recalls the 'Big Three' introduction, highlighting the immense pressure and difficulty of winning.

title: Meet your teeth‚Äôs invisible shield: Why enamel care matters most
content: Many Indians are unknowingly risking their teeth's natural shield, enamel, due to common habits like harsh brushing and acidic diets. This vital outer layer, crucial for preventing cavities and sensitivity, cannot regenerate once worn down.

title: Gujarat horror: For Rs 40 lakhs woman gets lover to kill sister; put herself as nominee
content: A shocking murder plot has been uncovered in Vadodara where a woman allegedly orchestrated her sister's death to claim a Rs 40 lakh life insurance policy. Police arrested Feroza Dewan and her lover, Rameez Sheikh, who confessed to strangling Ajiza Dewan with her dupatta. Feroza reportedly promised Sheikh Rs 7 lakh for the deed.

title: ‚ÄòShaadi chhod ke aaya‚Äô: Fan skips wedding for Messi; left disappointed
content: Football fans in Kolkata faced disappointment as Lionel Messi's event ended abruptly. Crowd management issues led to frustration and anger among attendees. Many fans expressed dissatisfaction with the event's organization and their inability to see the star. Some fans made significant personal sacrifices to attend. The event left many with unfulfilled expectations.

title: Brittany Mahomes breaks silence with yellow post as Patrick faces tough week
content: Following a tough 20-10 loss to the Texans, Brittany Mahomes' game-day fashion took center stage. Her striking yellow coat, shared with a simple emoji caption and turned-off comments, became a symbol of hope and quiet strength amidst the Kansas City Chiefs' challenging season. This subtle display offered a message of support and resilience.

title: Thailand-Cambodia clash: 4 Thai soldiers killed; Bangkok rejects Trump truce claim
content: Four Thai soldiers were killed in ongoing border clashes with Cambodian forces, escalating the conflict to at least 24 deaths this week.  Displaced civilians expressed distrust in peace efforts, while Thailand's Prime Minister denied a ceasefire agreement with the US President Trump. Both nations accused each other of reigniting hostilities.

title: A Messi affair: What led to the chaos at Kolkata's Salt Lake Stadium?
content: Lionel Messi's highly anticipated G.O.A.T. Tour stop in Kolkata was marred by chaos due to poor crowd management and security lapses. Thousands of fans were left disappointed as the event was cut short, with objects thrown and chairs damaged amid visible anger.

title: 50% tariff shock: India in touch with Mexico over ‚Äòunilateral‚Äô move
content: India is actively engaging with Mexico over a "unilateral" tariff hike of up to 50% on a wide range of products. New Delhi seeks solutions beneficial to both nations while protecting Indian exporters' interests, as the increased duties are set to take effect from January 1, 2026.

title: 'I sincerely apologise to Messi': Mamata reacts to chaos at Kolkata stadium
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee expressed deep shock and distress over the chaotic mismanagement at Salt Lake Stadium during Lionel Messi's visit. She extended sincere apologies to the football icon, fans, and sports lovers for the unfortunate incident.

title: Kerala local body polls: NDA scripts history; PM hails 'watershed moment' - key points
content: Kerala's local body election results reveal a significant shift, with the UDF emerging as the dominant force, unseating the LDF in several key urban areas. The BJP-led NDA also made notable gains, securing the Thiruvananthapuram Corporation in a watershed moment for the party in the state.

title: Chaos, screams and collapse: 8 stampedes, 127 dead ‚Äî The anatomy of India‚Äôs crowd tragedies in 2025
content: India witnessed a grim year in 2025 with eight stampedes claiming 127 lives across various public gatherings. From religious sites to railway stations and political rallies, overcrowding and poor planning turned joyous occasions into tragedies. These preventable incidents highlight critical gaps in crowd safety management nationwide.

title: Multiple vehicles collide on Noida expressway amid dense fog; several injured
content: Dense fog on the Eastern Peripheral Expressway caused a multi-vehicle collision on Saturday morning, resulting in several injuries. Poor visibility was the primary cause of the pile-up. Emergency services responded promptly, transporting the injured to local hospitals for medical attention.

title: Watch: Trump calls resurfaced photos with Epstein 'no big deal'
content: President Trump dismissed newly released photos with Jeffrey Epstein as "no big deal," stating many people knew the convicted sex offender. House Democrats shared over 95,000 images, including those of Trump, Bill Clinton, and Bill Gates, raising questions about Epstein's network. The White House accused Democrats of politicizing the release.

title: Thane snakebite case: How cops unravelled woman's death as murder after 3 years;
content: Three years after a woman's death from a snakebite was ruled accidental, police have arrested her husband and three friends, revealing a murder conspiracy. The husband allegedly orchestrated the killing due to domestic disputes, enlisting a snake rescuer friend to provide the venomous snake used in the fatal incident.

title: 'Only politicians, actors were surrounding Messi': Kolkata fans left frustrated
content: Hundreds of fans erupted in anger at Kolkata's Salt Lake Stadium after Lionel Messi's brief appearance at a ticketed event. Spectators threw bottles and chairs, with some breaking barricades, frustrated by their inability to see the football star after paying high ticket prices. The event was marred by poor crowd management and unmet expectations.

title: Rajkot: Cop shoots himself dead at police commissioner office; distressed over family matters
content: An SRP constable allegedly shot himself dead with his service rifle at the Police Commissioner office in Rajkot early Friday. Preliminary investigations suggest marital discord as the cause, with a six-month-old video surfacing where the constable expressed distress over his wife leaving him and property disputes. This is the second such incident in two days involving police personnel.

title: Video of Pakistan PM Shehbaz Sharif gatecrashing Putin‚ÄìErdogan meet viral: Is it real?
content: Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif reportedly "gatecrashed" a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan after waiting over 40 minutes. This incident occurred as Sharif continues efforts to strengthen ties with Moscow, despite acknowledging Russia's close partnership with India.

title: 'Opens up new prospects': Ancient underwater wall discovered off French coast; hints at coastal societies
content: A colossal 7,000-year-old granite wall, France's largest underwater construction, has been unearthed off Brittany's coast. This 120-meter structure, found with smaller man-made elements, offers profound insights into early coastal societies and their ingenious adaptations to rising sea levels.  Experts suggest it may have served as a fish trap or a protective dyke, showcasing remarkable Mesolithic or early Neolithic engineering skills.

title: 'We want our money back': Rs 12,000 ticket for glimpse of Lionel Messi - Angry fans vandalise Salt Lake Stadium
content: Fans erupted in chaos and vandalized the Salt Lake Stadium after Lionel Messi's early departure from the GOAT Tour event in Kolkata. Spectators, having paid hefty sums, expressed fury over the mismanagement and inability to see the football legend, demanding refunds and calling the event a scam.

title: 'Not surprising': Cong blames Trump-Modi ties over India not being part of Pax Silica; what is the initiative?
content: The Congress party criticised Prime Minister Modi after India's exclusion from the US-led "Pax Silica" initiative, a nine-nation effort to counter Chinese dominance in high-tech supply chains.  Party leader Jairam Ramesh cited a "sharp downturn in Trump‚ÄìModi ties" as a likely reason, questioning the government's foreign policy effectiveness despite recent calls between the leaders.

title: Congress MP claims BJP neta was drunk during Rahul Gandhi's speech
content: A Congress MP has accused a senior BJP member of attending Lok Sabha proceedings "drunk" during Rahul Gandhi's speech on electoral reforms.  The MP cited the individual's "repeated gestures" and "tottering" as evidence, urging the BJP to prevent such incidents. This allegation follows a recent row over a TMC MP allegedly "vaping" in the House, highlighting concerns over parliamentary decorum.

title: Gatecrash or misrepresentation? Did Pak PM interrupt Putin's closed-door meeting? Fact check
content: Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif faced online criticism on Friday after video alleged that he entered a closed-door meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, at the International Forum for Peace and Trust in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan. The video was later deleted, claiming that it may have been a "misrepresentation of the events".

title: Haryana‚Äôs English assistant professor qualifying test: Under 10% clear exam; 462 posts vacant
content: Haryana Public Service Commission's assistant professor exam in English saw a dismal pass rate, with less than 10% of candidates qualifying, leaving hundreds of posts vacant. Despite many aspirants holding PhDs and UGC-NET/JRF qualifications, the commission cited "weak written skills" for the low scores, sparking widespread protests and demands for transparency in the evaluation process.

title: 'Total embarrassment': BJP targets TMC after chaos during Messi's stadium visit; shares footage
content: Chaos erupted at Kolkata's Salt Lake Stadium during Lionel Messi's brief visit, with angry fans throwing projectiles after being unable to see the football icon due to mismanagement. The BJP criticized the Trinamool Congress for the "total embarrassment" on an international stage, highlighting wasted fan efforts and zero planning for the highly anticipated event.

title: Rs 3,600 crore project: Haryana ties up with World Bank to cut pollution
content: Haryana has launched its most ambitious environmental initiative, the 'Haryana Clean Air Project for Sustainable Development,' in collaboration with the World Bank, with a Rs 3,600 crore corpus. This project aims to significantly improve air quality over five years through sweeping interventions, including industrial upgrades, e-bus procurement, and enhanced monitoring infrastructure.

title: Goa nightclub fire fallout: Delhi bans firecrackers in clubs; New Year safety tightened
content: Delhi's excise department has banned firecrackers, including electric ones, in clubs, restaurants, and bars ahead of holiday festivities. This safety measure, prompted by a Goa nightclub fire, mandates functional fire-safety systems and valid NOCs for all licensed establishments. Violators face strict action, including license suspension or cancellation.

title: Bihar: JD(U) backs Rohini Yadav safety plea, offers security; RJD, Lalu family remain silent
content: In a decisive move advocating for women's safety, JD(U) has extended comprehensive security measures to Rohini Acharya, daughter of Lalu Prasad, following her urgent plea. While Rohini expressed fear regarding the safety of parental homes, the RJD and the Lalu family remained notably mute on the subject.

title: Delhi AQI turns 'severe': GRAP Stage III reimposed across NCR; what's allowed & what's not
content: Delhi plunged back into 'severe' air quality on Saturday, triggering Stage III restrictions across the NCR. Overnight pollution surge, driven by slow winds and stable atmosphere, pushed the AQI to 401. Authorities have intensified preventive measures as a thick smog blanket reduced visibility and worsened discomfort, urging vulnerable groups to limit outdoor exposure.

title: ‚ÄòTrillions rolling in‚Äô: Why Trump‚Äôs massive tariffs haven‚Äôt resolved American woes
content: President Trump touts rising government revenues and investment pledges as proof of his economic strategy's success. However, many Americans face affordability pressures, creating a disconnect between headline growth and personal finances. Critics argue that while tariffs have increased, they haven't significantly eased cost-of-living strains for households.

title: Parking lot shooting in Canada: 3 Indian-origin men arrested - police share footage
content: Three Indian-origin men were arrested in Brampton, Canada, following a shooting in a parking lot linked to a tow-truck dispute. Peel Regional Police identified the accused as Manjot Bhatti, Navjot Bhatti, and Amanjot Bhatti. The investigation is ongoing, with police seeking an additional suspect.

title: Bottles thrown, banners vandalised: Lionel Messi forced to exit Salt Lake Stadium early - Watch
content: Football icon Lionel Messi's Kolkata visit was a whirlwind of adoration and disruption. While a massive crowd caused chaos during his stadium appearance, leading to security concerns, fans also celebrated his legacy with a 70-foot statue unveiling. Messi's return after 14 years ignited immense enthusiasm, highlighting his enduring popularity.

title: Boost for Makhana sector! Govt holds first meeting; Rs 476-crore scheme rolled out
content: The Indian government has launched a Rs 476.03 crore, six-year development program to modernize the makhana sector. This initiative, overseen by the National Makhana Board, focuses on research, quality seed production, farmer training, and enhancing value addition, branding, and export promotion across the country.

title: 'He won't be India's captain... ': Suryakumar Yadav gets big warning | IND vs SA
content: India's T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav is under scrutiny for a significant dip in form, having gone 20 innings without a fifty. Former batter Aakash Chopra emphasized the captain's primary role is to score runs, especially with the T20 World Cup approaching. Both Yadav and vice-captain Shubman Gill's consistent performances are deemed crucial for the team's confidence.

title: Punjab Woman Killed By Lover After She Attacks His Private Parts
content: A woman was killed by her lover after she attacked and injured his genitals in a hotel room in Punjab's Ludhiana district.

title: Ex-BJP MLA, Son Named In 20,000-Page Chargesheet In Karnataka 'Vote Theft' Case
content: A former BJP MLA is among seven persons named in a chargesheet in the vote theft case in Karnataka during the 2023 assembly elections.

title: 'No Big Deal, He Has Photos With Everybody': Trump On New Epstein Images
content: US President Donald Trump said that the newly released photos of sex offender Jeffrey Epstein and him with multiple women were "no big deal" and that he had not even seen them.

title: In Kerala Local Body Polls, A Big BJP Win, And Another Shashi Tharoor Stinger
content: The results in the local body elections in Kerala have come as a setback for the ruling Left Democratic Front (LDF) in the state ahead of elections next year.

title: Rajinikanth's Pic Used In Karthigai Deepam Strike, His Team Distances Itself
content: A poster featuring a picture of superstar Rajinikanth, along with a message put up at the hunger strike venue at Thiruparankundram in Tamil Nadu's Madurai district, has stirred fresh controversy in the Karthigai Deepam row.

title: "Kolkata Ashamed": A Blame Game Over Messi Event Chaos And Refund Order
content: Thousands of football fans had gathered in Kolkata this morning to catch a glimpse of Lionel Messi. But what could have been a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to witness live one of the greatest footballers of their times turned out to be a nightmare.

title: No Monitoring Of Emissions From 11 Coal Plants Near Delhi For 10 Years: RTI
content: As Delhi gasps under a toxic haze with the air quality index soaring past 400 into the 'severe' category, necessitating the hasty re-imposition of stringent GRAP-3 restrictions across the NCR.

title: Mamata Banerjee's Public Apology To Messi, Fans After Kolkata Event Chaos
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee has apologised to Lionel Messi and his fans over the chaos that unfolded at his event in Kolkata this morning.

title: "Total Embarrassment": BJP Jabs Mamata Banerjee Over Chaos At Messi Event
content: As chaotic scenes unfolded during star footballer Lionel Messi's event at the Salt Lake Stadium in Kolkata, the BJP ripped into West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee and her Trinamool party for "complete mismanagement."

title: 'Plumbers Will Survive AI': Raghuram Rajan Flags India's Failure To Train For Hands-On Jobs
content: Rajan warned that this skills gap begins early. "We are failing some of our kids even in childhood," he said.

title: How Stepping Out For A Meal Became Luthra Brothers' Undoing In Thailand
content: Sources told NDTV that this short outing on December 9 led the authorities to discover that the brothers, for whom the police were searching in India, were in Phuket.

title: "25 Lives Lost, But My Wife Died Alive": Goa Club Dancer's Husband To NDTV
content: The investigation into the tragedy is continuing to widen, with the Goa Police recording over 60 statements so far.

title: US Funeral Home Mistakenly Gives Family Dead Son's Brain Instead Of Clothes
content: Alex's father reportedly removed the brain from the washing machine, returned it to the bag, and took it back to Singh at the funeral home.

title: Ex-Air Force Officer Arrested In Assam On Charges Of Spying For Pakistan
content: Police sources said they were keeping a close eye on the arrested person, who was allegedly in touch with and supplying sensitive information to individuals linked to a Pakistani spying agency.

title: US Briefly Withheld Intelligence From Israel Over Gaza War During Biden Era
content: US intelligence officials temporarily suspended sharing some key information with Israel during the Biden administration over concerns about its conduct of the war in Gaza, according to six people familiar with the matter.

title: "Show Results First": Bhagwant Mann Jabs Rahul Gandhi, Navjot Sidhu
content: Bhagwant Mann's comments came in the backdrop of fresh statements by Navjot Kaur Sidhu, who recently criticised the Congress leadership in Punjab.

title: Video: Women Thwart Snatching Attempt In Punjab, Chase Away Robbers On Bike
content: Two women in Punjab's Ludhiana thwarted a snatching attempt and chased away assailants on bike. The incident, captured on CCTV, shows the women confronting the robbers, who were armed with sharp objects, and saving their valuables.

title: "Want Guilty To Be Punished": Zubeen Garg's Wife On Assam Cops' Chargesheet
content: Zubeen Garg's wife Garima on Friday welcomed the chargesheet filed by the Special Investigation Team (SIT), which named four people in connection with the singer's murder.

title: Second airport for Bengaluru: Tenders invited for feasibility study, says Minister M.B. Patil
content: The State government has identified sites at Choodahalli and Somanahalli on Kanakapura Road, besides another location near Nelamangala, for the proposed airport, said the Minister

title: Will make Bastar the most developed tribal region by 2030, says Shah
content: Amit Shah lauded all participants, especially mentioning the surrendered Maoists, who competed in the Bastar Olympics, even as he reiterated his appeal to all Maoists to lay down arms

title: Two labourers mowed down by car on NICE Road
content: A police officer investigating the case said the women had finished work and were heading home when the incident took place

title: 10 Manipur BJP MLAs fly to Delhi to meet party's central leaders
content: Former CM N Biren Singh said he was hopeful that "some positive decision" would be taken at the meeting

title: Messi‚Äôs Hyderabad visit aimed at promoting football, not a competitive match: Telangana DGP
content: According to the schedule shared by the police, Messi will take part in a short on-field interaction, including a brief kick about with Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy

title: Messi to enter Hyderabad stadium at 7.50 p.m. and leave at 9 p.m.
content: The officials released a minute-by-minute programme of Messi‚Äôs schedule leaving no scope for any problems. The evening will begin with the match kick-off at 7.50 p.m.

title: Income Tax department sends SMS/emails for bogus political donation claims
content: The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) alerts that a huge amount of bogus claims have been made on account of donations to Registered Unrecognised Political Parties (RUPPs) or Charitable Institutions and reduced their tax obligations

title: Andhra Pradesh Governor says dialogue is the most powerful instrument of peace
content: The Andhra Pradesh Governor, spoke at a global peace conclave about India‚Äôs spiritual heritage, democratic values and commitment to human dignity, which places the country in a unique position to guide global discourse on peace

title: Congress takes swipe at PM Modi over India being left out of U.S.-led ‚ÄòPax Silica‚Äô initiative
content: Congress MP and General Secretary Jairam Ramesh said reports suggest that the U.S. has excluded India from a nine-nation initiative designed to reduce Chinese dominance in high-tech supply chains

title: Congress to hold rally at Ramlila Maidan on December 14 to put Govt, EC in dock over 'vote theft'
content: Congress general secretary in-charge of organisation K.C. Venugopal has said the party has collected about 5.50 crore signatures against "vote chori"

title: Orissa HC asks Centre to allow opt-out option in APAAR ID consent forms
content: Court flags privacy concerns in APAAR ID scheme linked to Aadhaar, asks government to revisit consent process

title: Kerala local body polls: BJP captures power in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, ending decades-long LDF rule
content: BJP-led NDA wins 50 wards in the 101-ward Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, while the LDF was reduced to 29 wards. UDF wins 19 seats, a strong comeback for the front

title: Kerala local body polls: Strong showing in local polls widens UDF‚Äôs path to victory in 2026 Assembly elections, says Satheesan
content: LoP Satheesan said the UDF‚Äôs emergence as a big tent accommodating varied social groups catalysed the coalition‚Äôs ‚Äúbest performance since the first elections for local bodies in 1995‚Äù¬†

title: Fadnavis slams Congress for questioning renaming of MGNREGA; says Modi Govt brought positive change
content: The Union Cabinet approved a Bill to rename the MGNREGA as 'Poojya Bapu Grameen Rozgar Yojna', and the number of workdays under it would be increased from 100 days at present to 125 days

title: Kerala local body polls: Twenty20 crashes in Kochi as Kitex outfit shrinks to margins
content: While the outfit retained power in Kizhakkambalam panchayat, its headquarters, and Aikkaranadu panchayat, it lost Kunnathunadu and Mazhuvannoor panchayats

title: Move to impeach Justice Swaminathan an attempt to destabilise judiciary: HC advocates
content: It was a ‚Äúhigh-handed application of one of the most extraordinary provisions of the Constitution,‚Äù said designated senior advocates and advocates practising before the Madurai Bench of the Madras High Court

title: Lionel Messi event organiser detained, trying to ensure refunds for fans: West Bengal DGP
content: The main organiser of Messi‚Äôs G.O.A.T India tour, Shatadru Dutta, has been detained after violence erupted at Salt Lake Stadium¬†

title: YouTuber ‚ÄòSavukku‚Äô Shankar arrested by Chennai police
content: When personnel from the Meenambakkam and Madipakkam police stations went to his residence on Saturday morning, Shankar reportedly refused to come out and locked himself inside

title: Local body poll results signal end of LDF‚Äôs decade-long rule in Kerala, says BJP‚Äôs Rajeev Chandrasekhar
content: BJP Kerala president says the outcome shows that LDF‚Äôs 10-year tenure has been a ‚Äòcomplete failure‚Äô, marked by corruption and administrative shortcomings

title: India engaged with Mexico over 'unilateral' tariff hike
content: India says it reserves right to take ‚Äòappropriate measures‚Äô as Mexico hikes tariffs on its products among other Asian imports

title: IndiGo flight suffers tail strike while landing at Ranchi airport
content: The incident happened around 7.30 p.m. on Friday (December 12, 2025) when the Bhubaneswar-Ranchi flight was landing with around 70 passengers on board, officials said

title: Special trains between Visakhapatnam-SMVT Bengaluru to clear festival rush
content: East Coast Railway will operate special trains between Visakhapatnam and SMVT Bengaluru to clear the extra rush of passengers

title: Mahayuti will contest all local polls together, says Maharashtra BJP chief
content: The announcement comes in the backdrop of acrimony between ruling alliance partners during the recent local body elections where they were seen poaching each other‚Äôs candidates, leaders

title: Shivraj Patil‚Äôs last rites performed with State honours; Om Birla, Kharge present
content: Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge, Union Minister of State for Defence Sanjay Seth, former Maharashtra Chief Minister Ashok Chavan, and Karnataka Minister Eshwar Khandre were among those present

title: Families of Pakistani fishermen arrested by India urge government to seek their release
content: Indian media reported that their Coast Guard had apprehended the 11 Pakistani fishermen December 10 after their boat was found inside Indian waters near Jakhau

title: Retired IAF personnel arrested for alleged Pakistan links in Assam
content: Police said preliminary investigation revealed that the accused had shared sensitive documents and information with Pakistani operatives over social media

title: G.K. Vasan accuses DMK of using welfare schemes for electoral gains
content: He urged people to remain vigilant and said governance should not be reduced to ‚Äúvote-based business.‚Äù

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF storms Kochi Corporation; LDF routed
content: LDF wins only 22 seats, including two independents it supported, which was worse than its tally of 24 in 2010

title: One arrested in 'road accident' in which prime witness against TMC strongman Shajahan was injured
content: "Evidence showed his involvement in the road accident. We have arrested him and will question him. He will be produced in the court this afternoon," says the police officer

title: Deadline set for clearing legacy waste in Anantapur
content: In Anantapur, the bio-mining activity is being done in two phases to clear 3.30 lakh tonnes of garbage in the first phase and another 1.70 lakh tonnes in the second phase

title: Road works of ‚Çπ1.50 lakh crore have been approved for Maharashtra: Nitin Gadkari
content: The works will begin in the next three months, he told reporters on the premises of the Vidhan Bhavan, where the State legislature session is underway

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF sweeps Malappuram
content: UDF won 11 of the 12 municipalities, 84 of the 94 grama panchayats, 14 of the 15 block panchayats, and 31 of the 33 district panchayat council in Malappuram

title: National Technical Textiles Mission sets up demo farms for agro textiles
content: If agricultural universities in south India come forward, a demonstration farm can be set up in the south too, Mission Director Ashok Kumar Malhotra said in Coimbatore

title: Bombay High Court directs elections for¬†Buldhana¬†Waqf Trust in two months
content: Controversy erupted when Waqf Tribunal invalidated the 2019 election of trustees and annulled Maharashtra State Waqf Board‚Äôs approval of their change report, leading elected trustees to seek relief from High Court

title: Renaming MGNREGA will cost lot of government resources: Priyanka Gandhi
content: ‚ÄúFrom offices to stationery, everything has to be renamed, so this is a big, costly process. So what's the benefit of doing this unnecessarily? I can't understand," says Priyanka Gandhi

title: Kerala local body polls: After five years, Congress-led UDF romps back to power in Kochi Corporation
content: By noon, UDF was leading in 45 divisions, while the Left Democratic Front (LDF) was ahead in only 20. The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) was leading in six divisions, and independents in five. The UDF is on the cusp of replicating its best performance in recent times, the victory in 2010 when it bagged 48 seats.

title: Woman duped of ‚Çπ30 lakh in ‚Äòdigital arrest‚Äô scam
content: Police said the fraudsters, posing as police, threatened the woman that her bank account was used for terrorist money laundering activities

title: Resident doctors in Maharashtra face systemic neglect, says statewide survey
content: Central MARD‚Äôs statewide survey across 18 government medical colleges reveals failures in safety, accommodation and infrastructure, urging government intervention

title: Watch: PM Modi, leaders pay tribute on Parliament attack anniversary
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and leaders across parties paid tribute to the martyrs of the 2001 Parliament attack on its December 13 anniversary. Sonia Gandhi, Rahul Gandhi, Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, Yogi Adityanath and Nitin Gadkari honoured the fallen, remembering the security personnel who sacrificed their lives defending the nation. On December 13, 2001, five heavily armed terrorists belonging to the Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT) and Jaish-e-Mohammed (JeM) stormed the Parliament complex in New Delhi and opened fire indiscriminately. Around 14 people, including security personnel and a civilian, were killed in the attack.

title: Messi in Kolkata: Upset fans vandalise Salt Lake stadium; organiser detained; CM orders enquiry
content: CM Mamata Banerjee constitutes an enquiry committee over the incident and recommend measures to avoid such incidents in the future; fans were angry that despite buying tickets at steep prices they were not even able to catch a glimpse of Messi

title: T.N. to launch HPV vaccination programme in four districts with high incidence of cervical cancer
content: The first dose will be administered to 27,000 children in the four districts, Health Minister Ma. Subramanian told reporters on the sidelines of an event to mark World AIDS Day on Friday

title: Quota for nomadic communities: Karnataka Government assures equitable distribution of internal reservation
content: Following the assurance, the Karnataka Federation of Untouchable Nomadic Communities has temporarily suspended the 'Belagavi Chalo' protest announced earlier

title: Survey flags hazardous pesticide¬†use¬†in South Asia;¬†Maharashtra‚Äôs¬†Yavatmal¬†cotton belt under spotlight
content: A community-based study across four countries finds 87% of farmers use pesticides; India reports highest share of highly hazardous chemicals.

title: Suggestion to release goats in forest to curb leopard attacks laughable: Ajit Pawar
content: Maharashtra Forest Minister Ganesh Naik has suggested that forest officials release goats in large numbers in forests to stop leopards from entering human settlements in search of prey

title: T.N. moves review petition against Supreme Court verdict over planned dam at Mekedatu
content: The Tamil Nadu government has also submitted a representation to the Central Water Commission on December 9 underlining as to how Karnataka‚Äôs proposal to construct a dam at Mekedatu would affect Tamil Nadu

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF poised to reclaim Thrissur Corporation; ‚ÄòSuresh Gopi wave‚Äô fails to show up
content: The results mark a sharp reversal from the 2020 civic polls, when the UDF narrowly missed power in a dramatic finish

title: 2001 Parliament attack anniversary: Vice President, PM Modi, MPs pay tributes to fallen heroes
content: A brief function is held outside the now old Parliament building (Samvidhan Sadan) every December 13 to mark the day

title: The best and worst soccer statues ever (now including a 70-foot Messi)
content: the 38-year-old is visiting Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai and new Delhi . he is accompanied by two old friends in shape of former teammate Luis Su√°rez and rodrigo De Paul . the first stop was Kolkata, where Messi took part in a meet-and-greet session .

title: Tourists visiting US to submit five years of social media history: Is it because of JD Vance memes?
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. Join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world. Read More

title: NHL trade grades: Report cards for Hughes, Jarry deals
content: the Vancouver Canucks traded Quinn Hughes to the Minnesota Wild in exchange for Zeev Buium , Marco Rossi , Liam Ohgren and a 2026 first-round pick . Throughout the season up until the March 6 deadline, ESPN reporters will be grading each side on all of the big swaps .

title: How the new kickoff rules opened doors for some of the league's most dynamic players
content: the Cowboys should soundly defeat the Vikings this week . it's the rookie quarterback who sits on top . the kickoff rules changed 2024 before they were slightly tweaked in 2025 . Isaiah Williams signed a three-year contract extension in march .

title: MLB winter meetings winners, losers and head-scratching moves
content: the 2025 winter meetings didn't have a $700 million-plus deal like last year . but there were still a number of impactful free agent signings . veteran slugger Kyle Schwarber chose to return to the Philadelphia Phillies on a five-year deal in the first major splash of the meetings .

title: Patriots or Broncos: Breaking down the race for the AFC's No. 1 seed
content: the Denver Broncos and new England Patriots are separating from the pack in the race for the no. 1 seed . both enter this weekend with 11-2 records and are in the midst of 10-game winning streaks . payton recalls how his team was the No. 2 seed in the playoffs after the 2006 regular season .

title: Power Rankings: The 4-team race for No. 1
content: four teams had a legitimate case to be no. 1 in this week's Power Rankings . Michigan took the top spot thanks to the Wolverines' dominance at the Players Era Festival in Las Vegas . Arizona was our No. 1 team heading into Feast Week after the Wildcats knocked off UConn .

title: We made score picks for every postseason college football game
content: the 12-team college football playoff is no longer new . there are more justifiably aggrieved teams at being left out . the annual coaching carousel always impacts the postseason . new coach Pete Golding will make his debut in the biggest game in team history .
